entry.title: Swift Concurrency in Practice
entry.summary: A practical guide to using Swift concurrency in real-world apps.
entry.content:
Swift's concurrency model — actors, async/await, and structured concurrency — requires a shift in how we think about shared state.

This article walks through common patterns and pitfalls.

entry.title: SwiftData Deep Dive
entry.summary: Everything you need to know about SwiftData.
entry.content: SwiftData is Apple's modern persistence framework, combining the power of Core Data with a Swift-native API.
